index.title: Share the internet with your friends
index.body: {brand} makes it easy to start up a room, add your friends, and browse the web

discord.authenticationError: An error occured while authenticating. Please go home and Login with Discord again.

inRoom.title: Let's jump back into watching
inRoom.subtitle:
You're already in a room. Click the button below to get back into the room.
Want out? There's an option for that too

noRoom.title: Welcome Home
noRoom.subtitle:
It's never been easier to join or start a room with your friends.
Select an option below to get started

joinRoom.description: Received an invite link or an invite code for a room? Enter it here!

createRoom.description: Need a room where you can watch anything with your friends? This is the place to go

joinRoom.title: Join Room
joinRoom.subtitle: If your friend sent you an invite to a room, you're in the right place. Copy the invite into the box below and we'll get you sorted in no time

createRoom.title: Create a Room
createRoom.subtitle: When you create a room, you'll be able to add your friends and browse the internet.

invite.title: Join {room}
invite.subtitle: Start watching along with {membersList} instantly

inviteNotFound.title: Invite Not Found
inviteNotFound.subtitle: We couldn't find a room linked with this invite code. Make sure you have the right invite and try again!

invite.confirmLeave: Are you sure you want to leave {room} Once you leave, you cannot join back without an invite

chat.noMessages: Nobody said nothing. Maybe say something?

new.title: And so it begins...
new.body: Add a friend or two to get the party started! Once someone else joins this room, we'll queue up your room for a virtual browser

waiting.title: Hold your horses...
waiting.body:
We're waiting for the right gears to align so we can get your browser ready - hold tight!
If this is taking a little long, then either restart the room or contact support.

queued.title: You're in the queue!
queued.body: There are a couple rooms infront of you waiting for a virtual browser, it shouldn't take too long

creating.title: We're creating your browser now
creating.body:
Normally this takes a couple seconds, hang tight!
If you have any issues either refresh the page, ask the room owner to restart the browser or contact support.

starting.title: We're starting your browser now
starting.body:
Normally this takes a couple seconds, hang tight!
If you have any issues either refresh the page, ask the room owner to restart the browser or contact support.

connecting.title: Strap in...
connecting.body: Everything is ready - we're just getting the stream between you and the VM started!

muted.title: {brand} is muted
muted.body: Your browser requires user interaction in order to let us play video with audio
